languages.text: "Умерла? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}И с кем же ты тогда говоришь{/d}? Утряси в своей пустой голове простую истину — твоя роль в происходящем ничтожна. Если я того пожелаю, ты будешь думать, что я и есть Император на Троне. Захочу — будешь считать меня мертвой. Но сейчас это все не имеет значения. Мне противно просто смотреть в твою сторону. Почему я вынуждена разговаривать с грязью?" {n}Последние слова явно предназначаются трибуналу, не вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Умерла? И с кем же ты тогда говоришь? Утряси в своей пустой голове простую истину — твоя роль в происходящем ничтожна. Если я того пожелаю, ты будешь думать, что я и есть Император на Троне. Захочу — будешь считать меня мертвой. Но сейчас это все не имеет значения. Мне противно просто смотреть в твою сторону. Почему я вынуждена разговаривать с грязью?" {n}Последние слова явно предназначаются трибуналу, не вам.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Умерла? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}И с кем же ты тогда говоришь{/d}? Утряси в своей пустой голове простую истину — твоя роль в происходящем ничтожна. Если я того пожелаю, ты будешь думать, что я и есть Император на Троне. Захочу — будешь считать меня мертвой. Но сейчас это все не имеет значения. Мне противно просто смотреть в твою сторону. Почему я вынуждена разговаривать с грязью?" {n}Последние слова явно предназначаются трибуналу, не вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Died, you say? But who are you talking to if I did? Get one simple truth into your empty head — your role in these events is insignificant. You will think I am the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why do I have to talk to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: « Morte, vous dites ? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}Mais à qui vous adressez-vous dans ce cas ?{/d} Acceptez cette simple vérité : votre rôle dans ces événements est dérisoire. Vous me prendrez pour l'Empereur sur le Trône d'or si je le désire, ou me penserez morte si cela me chante, mais ce n'est pas ce qui importe pour le moment. Le simple fait de regarder dans votre direction me donne la nausée. Pourquoi suis-je obligée de parler à cette immondice ? » {n}De toute évidence, ces derniers mots sont adressés au tribunal, pas à vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Morte, vous dites ? Mais à qui vous adressez-vous dans ce cas ? Acceptez cette simple vérité : votre rôle dans ces événements est dérisoire. Vous me prendrez pour l'Empereur sur le Trône d'or si je le désire, ou me penserez morte si cela me chante, mais ce n'est pas ce qui importe pour le moment. Le simple fait de regarder dans votre direction me donne la nausée. Pourquoi suis-je obligée de parler à cette immondice ? » {n}De toute évidence, ces derniers mots sont adressés au tribunal, pas à vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: “你说我死了？{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}可如果我死了，现在正在和你说话的人是谁？{/d}让我敲打一下你这空空荡荡的脑袋吧，你在这件事情上的作用微不足道。只要我愿意，我甚至可以让你以为我就是黄金王座上的帝皇本人。你以为我死了，这也不过是出于我的意愿罢了。不过，这些事情都不重要。光是看着你的方向，我就觉得恶心，我凭什么要对这粗鄙的家伙开口？”{n}最后几句话并不是对你说的，显然是对在场所有人说的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你说我死了？可如果我死了，现在正在和你说话的人是谁？让我敲打一下你这空空荡荡的脑袋吧，你在这件事情上的作用微不足道。只要我愿意，我甚至可以让你以为我就是黄金王座上的帝皇本人。你以为我死了，这也不过是出于我的意愿罢了。不过，这些事情都不重要。光是看着你的方向，我就觉得恶心，我凭什么要和这些粗鄙的家伙开口？”{n}最后几句话并不是对你说的，显然是对整个法庭的人说的。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: 「死んだ、と言ったか？{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}だとしたら、お前は誰と話していることになる？{/d}の頭に一つ、単純な真実を叩き込んでおけ。今回の一連の出来事におけるお前の役割は微々たるものなのだ。私の選択や興味次第で、お前は私を黄金の玉座に座る皇帝だと思ったり、私が死んだと思ったりするのだよ。だが今はそんなことはどうでもいい。お前の方を見るだけで気分が悪くなる。なぜ汚物と話さなければならないのだ？」{n}言葉は明らかに、あなたではなく法廷に向けられたものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「死んだ、と言ったか？だが私が死んだとしたら、お前は誰と話していることになる？その空っぽの頭に一つ、単純な真実を叩き込んでおけ。今回の一連の出来事におけるお前の役割は微々たるものなのだ。私の選択や興味次第で、お前は私を黄金の玉座に座る皇帝だと思ったり、私が死んだと思ったりするのだよ。だが今はそんなことはどうでもいい。お前の方を見るだけで気分が悪くなる。なぜ汚物と話さなければならないのだ？」{n}最後の言葉は明らかに、あなたではなく法廷に向けられたものだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Gestorben, sagt Ihr? Wenn das so ist, mit wem sprecht Ihr dann gerade? Ihr solltet Euch einer einfachen Wahrheit bewusst werden – Ihr spielt bei diesen Ereignissen eine völlig unbedeutende Rolle. Ihr würdet mich für den Imperator auf dem Goldenen Thron halten, wenn ich es wollte, und mich für tot halten, wenn mir danach wäre, aber darum geht es gerade nicht. Einfach nur schon in Eure Richtung schauen sorgt dafür, dass mir schlecht wird. Warum muss ich mit dem Abschaum sprechen?" {n}Meine letzten Worte waren offensichtlich an den Hof gerichtet, nicht an Euch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? But who are you talking to if I did? Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gestorben, sagt Ihr? Wenn das so ist, mit wem sprecht Ihr dann gerade? Ihr solltet Euch einer einfachen Wahrheit bewusst werden – Ihr spielt bei diesen Ereignissen eine völlig unbedeutende Rolle. Ihr würdet mich für den Imperator auf dem Goldenen Thron halten, wenn ich es wöllte, und mich für tot halten, wenn mir danach wäre, aber darum geht es gerade nicht. Einfach nur schon in Eure Richtung schauen sorgt dafür, dass mir schlecht wird. Warum muss ich mit diesem Schmutz reden?" {n}Meine letzten Worte waren offensichtlich an den Hof gerichtet, nicht an Euch.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: «¿Muerta, dices? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}¿Y entonces con quién estás hablando?{/d} Métete una cosa en esa cabeza tuya, si el serrín te deja espacio: tu libre albedrío en este proceso es insignificante. Creerás que soy el mismísimo Emperador en el Trono Dorado si así lo deseo, y me darás por muerta si tal es mi capricho, pero ahora mismo no es eso lo que importa. Solo con mirarte me pongo enferma. ¿Por qué he de rebajarme a hablar con esta escoria?». {n}Evidentemente las últimas palabras van dirigidas al tribunal, no a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Muerta, dices? ¿Y entonces con quién estás hablando? Métete una cosa en esa cabeza tuya, si el serrín te deja espacio: tu libre albedrío en este proceso es mínimo. Creerás que soy el mismísimo Emperador en el Trono Dorado si así lo deseo, y me darás por muerta si tal es mi capricho, pero ahora mismo no es eso lo que importa. Solo con mirarte me pongo enferma. ¿Por qué he de rebajarme a hablar con esta escoria?». {n}Evidentemente las últimas palabras van dirigidas al tribunal, no a ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Öldüm mü? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}Eğer öyleyse şu an kiminle konuşuyorsunuz?{/d} O çalışmayan aklınıza şu basit gerçeği kazıyın: Bu olaylardaki rolünüz, yok sayılabilecek kadar küçük. Dilersem beni Altın Taht'ta oturan İmparator olarak düşünürsünüz, dilersem öldüğümü düşünürsünüz. Tabii şu anda bunun önemi yok. Olduğunuz tarafa bakmak bile beni hasta ediyor. Neden böylesi pisliklerle konuşmak zorunda kalıyorum ki?" {n}Bu son sözlerin sana değil, divana hitaben söylendiği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Died, you say? {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}But who are you talking to if I did?{/d} Get one simple truth into your empty head: your role in these events is negligible. You shall think me the Emperor on the Golden Throne if I so choose and think me dead if it strikes my fancy, but this is not what matters right now. Just looking in your direction makes me sick. Why must I speak to the filth?" {n}The last words are obviously meant for the court, not you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öldüm mü? Eğer öyleyse şu an kiminle konuşuyorsunuz? O tenha beyninize şu basit gerçeği yazın: Sizin bu olaylardaki rolünüz yok sayılabilecek kadar küçük. Eğer öyle istersem, beni Altın Taht'ında oturan İmparator olarak düşünürsünüz ve canım öyle isterse benim öldüğümü düşünürsünüz ama bunun şu an önemi yok. Sizin olduğunuz yöne bakmak bile beni hasta ediyor. Böylesi pisliklerle neden konuşmak zorunda oluyorum ki?" {n}Bu son sözlerin divana hitaben söylendiği belli. Sana değil.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

traits.locale_text: "Öldüm mü? Eğer öyleyse şu an kiminle konuşuyorsunuz? O tenha beyninize şu basit gerçeği yazın: Sizin bu olaylardaki rolünüz yok sayılabilecek kadar küçük. Eğer öyle istersem, beni Altın Taht'ında oturan İmparator olarak düşünürsünüz ve canım öyle isterse benim öldüğümü düşünürsünüz ama bunun şu an önemi yok. Sizin olduğunuz yöne bakmak bile beni hasta ediyor. Böylesi pisliklerle neden konuşmak zorunda oluyorum ki?" {n}Bu son sözlerin divana hitaben söylendiği belli. Sana değil.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora
